LanguageData.VME_Sweets_Craved.label: craved
LanguageData.VME_Sweets_Craved.description: Desserts and treats shouldn’t be withheld, sugary confections should be eaten at least every couple days.
LanguageData.VME_Sweets_Impartial.label: impartial
LanguageData.VME_Sweets_Impartial.description: Sweets aren’t that great, they can easily be left behind.
